article_title: Noem: Unified effort needed to stop sex trafficking

og.description: Combating human sex trafficking and its devastating impacts takes education and a community effort, Rep. Kristi Noem, R-S.D., stressed Friday during a roundtable discussion at the Rapid City Public Library.
